name: Ajaxify-Comments
author: Madan Koshti

sections.description:
This plugin will help you to have ajaxified comments on your site. The comment submission and pagination, also inline reply will be in ajax once you enable this theme.

A few notes about the sections above:
* This plugin is tested with the default theme twentyeleven. So, you might have to change some of the ID’s or Classes in javascript file for this plugin to work.
sections.installation: Upload the ajax-comment plugin to your blog, Activate it
sections.changelog:
3.4.1

  • Ajaxify the comment listing with pagination
  • Ajaxify the comment submission form, validation and errors
  • Ajaxify the comment inline reply form

short_description: This plugin will help you to have ajaxified comments on your site.
